20110131201010.000|20110131201013.000|TR0|
20110131201013.000|20110131201015.000|TR0|It -- it is very similar to the ruling in 
20110131201015.000|20110131201017.000|TR0|Virginia.  It's important to mention there 
20110131201017.000|20110131201019.000|TR0|are several federal judges that have found 
20110131201019.000|20110131201021.000|TR0|the law constitutional, which -- which
